00023 #include "HttpRequest.h"
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 void HttpRequest::unbase64(string str)
00027 {
00028         cout << "before " << str << endl;
00029         authinfo["Method"] = (str.substr(0,str.find(" ")));
00030         str = str.substr(str.find(" ")+1);
00031         cout << "bafter " << str << endl;
00032 
00033         /*unsigned char *input = (unsigned char *)str.c_str();
00034         int length = str.length();
00035 
00036         BIO *b64, *bmem;
00037 
00038         char *buffer = (char *)malloc(length);
00039         memset(buffer, 0, length);
00040 
00041         b64 = BIO_new(BIO_f_base64());
00042         bmem = BIO_new_mem_buf(input, length);
00043         bmem = BIO_push(b64, bmem);
00044 
00045         BIO_read(bmem, buffer, length);
00046 
00047         BIO_free_all(bmem);
00048 
00049         string temp(buffer);*/
00050         unsigned char *input = (unsigned char *)str.c_str();
00051         int length = str.length();
00052         string temp = CryptoHandler::base64decode(input,length);
00053         cout << "after " << temp << endl;
00054 
00055         authinfo["Username"] = (temp.substr(0,temp.find(":")));
00056         temp = temp.substr(temp.find(":")+1);
00057         authinfo["Password"] = (temp);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void HttpRequest::getOauthParams(string str)
00061 {
00062         authinfo["Method"] = str.substr(0,str.find(" "));
00063         str = str.substr(str.find(" ")+1);
00064         cout << str << endl;
00065 
00066         strVec tempv;
00067         boost::iter_split(tempv, str, boost::first_finder(","));
00068         for(unsigned int i=0;i<tempv.size();i++)
00069         {
00070                 strVec tempvv;
00071                 boost::iter_split(tempvv, tempv.at(i), boost::first_finder("="));
00072                 boost::replace_first(tempvv.at(0),"\r","");
00073                 boost::replace_first(tempvv.at(0),"\n","");
00074                 string temr = tempvv.at(1);
00075                 temr = temr.substr(temr.find("\"")+1);
00076                 temr = temr.substr(0,temr.find("\""));
00077                 authinfo[tempvv.at(0)] = temr;
00078                 authorderinf[authorderinf.size()+1] = tempvv.at(0);
00079                 //cout << tempvv.at(0) << " = " << temr << endl;
00080         }
00081 }
00082 
00083 HttpRequest::HttpRequest()
00084 {}
00085 HttpRequest::HttpRequest(strVec vec,string path)
00086 {
00087         if(vec.size()!=0){
00088         this->setContent("");
00089         string conten;
00090         bool contStarts = false;
00091         this->cookie = false;
00092         for(unsigned int i=0;i<vec.size();i++)
00093         {
00094                 strVec temp,vemp,memp;
00095                 if((vec.at(i)=="\r" || vec.at(i)==""|| vec.at(i)=="\r\n") && !contStarts)
00096                 {
00097                         contStarts = true;
00098                         continue;
00099                 }
00100                 //if(!contStarts && vec.at(i)=="\r")
00101                 //      contStarts = true;
00102                 boost::iter_split(temp, vec.at(i), boost::first_finder(": "));
00103                 if(!contStarts && temp.size()>1)
00104                 {
00105                         boost::replace_first(temp.at(1),"\r","");
00106                         if(temp.at(0)=="Host")
00107                                 this->setHost(temp.at(1));
00108                         else if(temp.at(0)=="User-Agent" || temp.at(0)=="User-agent")
00109                                 this->setUser_agent(temp.at(1));
00110                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept")
00111                                 this->setAccept(temp.at(1));
00112                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Authorization")
00113                         {
00114                                 cout << "found auth" <<endl;
00115                                 if(temp.at(1).find("oauth_")!=string::npos)
00116                                 {
00117                                         this->getOauthParams(temp.at(1));
00118                                 }
00119                                 else
00120                                         this->unbase64(temp.at(1));
00121                         }
00122                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept-Language" || temp.at(0)=="Accept-language")
00123                         {
00124                                 strVec lemp;
00125                                 this->setAccept_lang(temp.at(1));
00126                                 boost::iter_split(lemp, temp.at(1), boost::first_finder(","));
00127                                 for(unsigned int li=0;li<lemp.size();li++)
00128                                 {
00129                                         if(lemp.at(li).find(";")==string::npos && lemp.at(li)!="")
00130                                         {
00131                                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00132                                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00133                                                 size_t e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00134                                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00135                                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00136                                         }
00137                                         else if(lemp.at(li)!="")
00138                                         {
00139                                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00140                                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00141                                                 size_t e = t.find(";");
00142                                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00143                                                 e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00144                                                 t = t.substr(0,e);
00145                                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00146                                         }
00147                                 }
00148                                 //cout << temp.at(1) << flush;
00149                         }
00150                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept-Encoding" || temp.at(0)=="Accept-encoding")
00151                                 this->setAccept_encod(temp.at(1));
00152                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept-Charset" || temp.at(0)=="Accept-charset")
00153                                 this->setAccept_lang(temp.at(1));
00154                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Keep-Alive" || temp.at(0)=="Keep-alive")
00155                                 this->setKeep_alive(temp.at(1));
00156                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Connection")
00157                                 this->setConnection(temp.at(1));
00158                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Cache-Control" || temp.at(0)=="Cache-control")
00159                                 this->setCache_ctrl(temp.at(1));
00160                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Content-Type" || temp.at(0)=="Content-type")
00161                         {
00162                                 this->setContent_type(temp.at(1));
00163                                 string tempi(temp.at(1));
00164                                 size_t s = tempi.find("boundary");
00165                                 if(s!=string::npos)
00166                                 {
00167                                         this->setContent_type(tempi.substr(0,s));
00168                                         tempi = tempi.substr(s);
00169                                         strVec results;
00170                                         boost::iter_split(results, tempi, boost::first_finder("="));
00171                                         if(results.size()==2)
00172                                         {
00173                                                 string bound = "--" + results.at(1).substr(0,results.at(1).length());
00174                                                 this->setContent_boundary(bound);
00175                                         }
00176                                 }
00177                         }
00178                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Cookie")
00179                         {
00180                                 this->cookie = true;
00181                                 strVec results;
00182                                 boost::iter_split(results, temp.at(1), boost::first_finder("; "));
00183                                 for(unsigned j=0;j<(int)results.size();j++)
00184                                 {
00185                                         strVec results1;
00186                                         boost::iter_split(results1, results.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00187                                         if(results1.size()==2)
00188                                                 cookieattrs[results1.at(0)] = results1.at(1);
00189                                         else
00190                                                 cookieattrs[results1.at(0)] = "true";
00191                                 }
00192                         }
00193                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Content-Length" || temp.at(0)=="Content-length")
00194                                 this->setContent_len(temp.at(1));
00195                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Referer")
00196                                 this->setReferer(temp.at(1));
00197                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Pragma")
00198                                 this->setPragma(temp.at(1));
00199                         //cout << temp.at(0) <<  "---" << temp.at(1) << flush;
00200                 }
00201                 else
00202                 {
00203                         string tem = temp.at(0);
00204                         if(!contStarts && boost::find_first(tem, "GET"))
00205                         {
00206                                 boost::replace_first(tem,"GET ","");
00207                                 this->setMethod("GET");
00208                                 boost::iter_split(vemp, tem, boost::first_finder(" "));
00209                                 if(vemp.size()==2)
00210                                 {
00211                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(1),"\r","");
00212                                         this->setHttpVersion(vemp.at(1));
00213                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(0)," ","");
00214                                         if(vemp.at(0).find("?")!=string ::npos)
00215                                         {
00216                                                 strVec params;
00217                                                 string valu(vemp.at(0));
00218                                                 vemp[0] = valu.substr(0,vemp.at(0).find("?"));
00219                                                 valu = valu.substr(valu.find("?")+1);
00220                                                 //valu = CryptoHandler::urlDecode(valu);
00221                                                 boost::iter_split(params,valu , boost::first_finder("&"));
00222                                                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00223                                                 {
00224                                                         strVec param;
00225                                                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00226                                                         if(param.size()==2)
00227                                                         {
00228                                                                 string att = param.at(0);
00229                                                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00230                                                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00231                                                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00232                                                                 this->setRequestParam(att,CryptoHandler::urlDecode(param.at(1)));
00233                                                                 //cout << att << " = " << param.at(1) << endl;
00234                                                                 reqorderinf[reqorderinf.size()+1] = att;
00235                                                         }
00236                                                 }
00237                                         }
00238                                         this->setActUrl(vemp.at(0));
00239                                         boost::iter_split(memp, vemp.at(0), boost::first_finder("/"));
00240                                         int fs = vemp.at(0).find_first_of("/");
00241                                         int es = vemp.at(0).find_last_of("/");
00242                                         if(fs==es)
00243                                         {
00244                                                 this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00245                                                 this->setCntxt_name("default");
00246                                                 this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00247                                                 this->setUrl(path+"default/"+vemp.at(0));
00248                                         }
00249                                         else
00250                                         {
00251                                                 int ss = vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1).find("/");
00252                                                 if(ss>fs)
00253                                                 {
00254                                                         this->setCntxt_name(vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00255                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+this->getCntxt_name());
00256                                                         this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00257                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00258                                                 }
00259                                         }
00260                                 }
00261                         }
00262                         else if(!contStarts && boost::find_first(tem, "DELETE"))
00263                         {
00264                                 boost::replace_first(tem,"DELETE ","");
00265                                 this->setMethod("DELETE");
00266                                 boost::iter_split(vemp, tem, boost::first_finder(" "));
00267                                 if(vemp.size()==2)
00268                                 {
00269                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(1),"\r","");
00270                                         this->setHttpVersion(vemp.at(1));
00271                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(0)," ","");
00272                                         if(vemp.at(0).find("?")!=string ::npos)
00273                                         {
00274                                                 strVec params;
00275                                                 string valu(vemp.at(0));
00276                                                 vemp[0] = valu.substr(0,vemp.at(0).find("?"));
00277                                                 valu = valu.substr(valu.find("?")+1);
00278                                                 valu = CryptoHandler::urlDecode(valu);
00279                                                 boost::iter_split(params,valu, boost::first_finder("&"));
00280                                                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00281                                                 {
00282                                                         strVec param;
00283                                                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00284                                                         if(param.size()==2)
00285                                                         {
00286                                                                 string att = param.at(0);
00287                                                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00288                                                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00289                                                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00290                                                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00291                                                                 reqorderinf[reqorderinf.size()+1] = att;
00292                                                         }
00293                                                 }
00294                                         }
00295                                         this->setActUrl(vemp.at(0));
00296                                         boost::iter_split(memp, vemp.at(0), boost::first_finder("/"));
00297                                         int fs = vemp.at(0).find_first_of("/");
00298                                         int es = vemp.at(0).find_last_of("/");
00299                                         if(fs==es)
00300                                         {
00301                                                 this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00302                                                 this->setCntxt_name("default");
00303                                                 this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00304                                                 this->setUrl(path+"default/"+vemp.at(0));
00305                                         }
00306                                         else
00307                                         {
00308                                                 int ss = vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1).find("/");
00309                                                 if(ss>fs)
00310                                                 {
00311                                                         this->setCntxt_name(vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00312                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+this->getCntxt_name());
00313                                                         this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00314                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00315                                                 }
00316                                         }
00317                                 }
00318                         }
00319                         else if(!contStarts && boost::find_first(tem, "POST"))
00320                         {
00321                                 boost::replace_first(tem,"POST ","");
00322                                 this->setMethod("POST");
00323                                 boost::iter_split(vemp, tem, boost::first_finder(" "));
00324                                 if(vemp.size()==2)
00325                                 {
00326                                         //this->setUrl(vemp.at(0));
00327                                         //string pat(vemp.at(0));
00328                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(1),"\r","");
00329                                         this->setHttpVersion(vemp.at(1));
00330                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(0)," ","");
00331                                         this->setActUrl(vemp.at(0));
00332                                         boost::iter_split(memp, vemp.at(0), boost::first_finder("/"));
00333                                         int fs = vemp.at(0).find_first_of("/");
00334                                         int es = vemp.at(0).find_last_of("/");
00335                                         if(fs==es)
00336                                         {
00337                                                 this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00338                                                 this->setCntxt_name("default");
00339                                                 this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00340                                                 this->setUrl(path+"default/"+vemp.at(0));
00341                                         }
00342                                         else
00343                                         {
00344                                                 int ss = vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1).find("/");
00345                                                 if(ss>fs)
00346                                                 {
00347                                                         this->setCntxt_name(vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00348                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+this->getCntxt_name());
00349                                                         this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00350                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00351                                                 }
00352                                         }
00353                                 }
00354                         }
00355                         else if(contStarts)
00356                         {
00357                                 /*string temp;
00358                                 if(vec.at(i).find("<?")!=string::npos && vec.at(i).find("?>")!=string::npos)
00359                                 {
00360                                         temp = vec.at(i).substr(vec.at(i).find("?>")+2);
00361                                         conten.append(temp);
00362                                 }
00363                                 else*/
00364                                 conten.append(vec.at(i));
00365                                 if(i!=vec.size()-1)
00366                                         conten.append("\n");
00367                                 //this->content=con;
00368                         }
00369                 }
00370         }
00371         this->setContent(conten);
00372         /*if(this->getContent()!="")
00373         {
00374                 strVec params;
00375                 string content = this->getContent();
00376                 //cout << content << flush;
00377                 boost::iter_split(params, content, boost::first_finder("&"));
00378                 //cout << "\n\n\nsize: " << params.size() << flush;
00379                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00380                 {
00381                         strVec param;
00382                         //cout << params.at(j) << flush;
00383                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00384                         //cout << param.size() << flush;
00385                         if(param.size()==2)
00386                         {
00387                                 string att = param.at(0);
00388                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00389                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00390                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00391                                 //cout << "attribute:  " << param.at(0) << "\n"<< flush;
00392                                 //cout << "value: " << param.at(1) << "\n" << flush;
00393                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00394                         }
00395                 }
00396         }*/
00397         if(this->getContent()!="")
00398         {
00399                 cout << this->getContent() << flush;
00400                 if(this->getContent_type().find("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")!=string::npos)
00401                 {
00402                         strVec params;
00403                         string valu(this->getContent());
00404                         boost::iter_split(params,valu , boost::first_finder("&"));
00405                         for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00406                         {
00407                                 strVec param;
00408                                 boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00409                                 if(param.size()==2)
00410                                 {
00411                                         string att = param.at(0);
00412                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00413                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00414                                         boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00415                                         this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00416                                         reqorderinf[reqorderinf.size()+1] = att;
00417                                 }
00418                         }
00419                 }
00420                 else if(this->getContent()!="" && this->getContent_boundary()!="")
00421                 {
00422                         string delb = "\r"+this->getContent_boundary();
00423                         string delend = "\r"+this->getContent_boundary()+"--";
00424                         size_t stb = this->getContent().find_first_of(delb)+delb.length()+1;
00425                         size_t enb = this->getContent().find_last_not_of(delend);
00426                         string param_conts = this->getContent().substr(stb);
00427                         boost::replace_first(param_conts,delend,"");
00428                         param_conts = param_conts.substr(0,param_conts.length()-1);
00429                         strVec parameters;
00430                         boost::iter_split(parameters, param_conts, boost::first_finder(delb));
00431                         //cout << "Boundary: " << this->getContent_boundary() << flush;
00432                         //cout << "\nLength: " << this->getContent().length() << flush;
00433                         //cout << "\nStart End: " << stb << " " << enb << "\n" << flush;
00434                         //cout << "\nContent: " << param_conts << "\n" << flush;
00435                         for(unsigned j=0;j<parameters.size();j++)
00436                         {
00437                                 if(parameters.at(j)=="" || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of(" ")==string::npos
00438                                                 || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of("\r")==string::npos)
00439                                         continue;
00440                                 FormData datf;
00441                                 string parm = parameters.at(j);
00442                                 //cout << parm << "\nparm" << flush;
00443                                 size_t dis = parm.find("Content-Disposition: ");
00444                                 if(dis==string::npos)
00445                                         dis = parm.find("Content-disposition: ");
00446                                 string cont_disp,cont_type;
00447                                 if(dis!=string::npos)
00448                                 {
00449                                         size_t dist = parm.find("Content-Type: ");
00450                                         if(dist==string::npos)
00451                                                 dist = parm.find("Content-yype: ");
00452                                         size_t dise;
00453                                         if(dist==string::npos)
00454                                         {
00455                                                 dist = parm.find("\r\r");
00456                                                 dise = dist + 2;
00457                                                 //cout << "\ndist = npos" << flush;
00458                                         }
00459                                         else
00460                                         {
00461                                                 //parm = parm.substr(dist+14);
00462                                                 cont_type = parm.substr(dist+14,parm.find("\r\r")-(dist+14));
00463                                                 dise = parm.find("\r\r") + 2;
00464                                                 //cout << "\nctype = " << cont_type << flush;
00465                                                 //dist = dist-12;
00466                                         }
00467                                         cont_disp = parm.substr(dis+21,dist-(dis+21));
00468                                         boost::replace_first(cont_disp,"\r","");
00469                                         //cout << "\ncdisp = " << cont_disp << flush;
00470                                         //cout << "\ndise = " << dise << flush;
00471                                         parm = parm.substr(dise);
00472                                 }
00473                                 strVec parmdef;
00474                                 boost::iter_split(parmdef, cont_disp, boost::first_finder(";"));
00475                                 string key;
00476                                 for(unsigned k=0;k<parmdef.size();k++)
00477                                 {
00478                                         if(parmdef.at(k)!="" && parmdef.at(k).find("=")!=string::npos)
00479                                         {
00480                                                 size_t stpd = parmdef.at(k).find_first_not_of(" ");
00481                                                 size_t enpd = parmdef.at(k).find_last_not_of(" ");
00482                                                 //cout << "\nparmdef = " << parmdef.at(k) << flush;
00483                                                 //cout << "\nst en = " << stpd  << " " << enpd << flush;
00484                                                 string propert = parmdef.at(k).substr(stpd,enpd-stpd+1);
00485                                                 strVec proplr;
00486                                                 boost::iter_split(proplr, propert, boost::first_finder("="));
00487                                                 if(proplr.size()==2)
00488                                                 {
00489                                                         if(proplr.at(0)=="name" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00490                                                         {
00491                                                                 key = proplr.at(1);
00492                                                                 key = key.substr(key.find_first_not_of("\""),key.find_last_not_of("\"")-key.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00493                                                                 boost::replace_first(cont_type,"\r","");
00494                                                                 datf.type = cont_type;
00495                                                                 datf.value = parm;
00496                                                         }
00497                                                         else if(proplr.at(0)=="filename" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00498                                                         {
00499                                                                 string fna = proplr.at(1);
00500                                                                 fna = fna.substr(fna.find_first_not_of("\""),fna.find_last_not_of("\"")-fna.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00501                                                                 datf.fileName = fna;
00502                                                         }
00503                                                 }
00504                                         }
00505                                 }
00506                                 if(key!="")
00507                                 {
00508                                         this->setRequestParamF(key,datf);
00509                                         string hr = (key + " " + datf.type + " "+ datf.fileName+" "+ datf.value);
00510                                         //cout << hr << flush;
00511                                 }
00512                         }
00513                 }
00514 
00515         }
00516         }
00517         //cout << this->toString() << flush;
00518 }
00519 
00520 string HttpRequest::buildRequest(const char *keyc,const char *valuec)
00521 {
00522         string retval;
00523         stringstream ss;
00524         string key,value;
00525         key = keyc;
00526         value = valuec;
00527         if(key=="Host")
00528                 this->setHost(value);
00529         else if(key=="User-Agent" || key=="User-agent")
00530                 this->setUser_agent(value);
00531         else if(key=="Accept")
00532                 this->setAccept(value);
00533         else if(key=="Accept-Language" || key=="Accept-language")
00534         {
00535                 strVec lemp;
00536                 this->setAccept_lang(value);
00537                 boost::iter_split(lemp, value, boost::first_finder(","));
00538                 for(unsigned int li=0;li<lemp.size();li++)
00539                 {
00540                         if(lemp.at(li).find(";")==string::npos && lemp.at(li)!="")
00541                         {
00542                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00543                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00544                                 size_t e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00545                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00546                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00547                         }
00548                         else if(lemp.at(li)!="")
00549                         {
00550                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00551                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00552                                 size_t e = t.find(";");
00553                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00554                                 e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00555                                 t = t.substr(0,e);
00556                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00557                         }
00558                 }
00559                 //cout << temp.at(1) << flush;
00560         }
00561         else if(key=="Accept-Encoding" || key=="Accept-encoding")
00562                 this->setAccept_encod(value);
00563         else if(key=="Accept-Charset" || key=="Accept-charset")
00564                 this->setAccept_lang(value);
00565         else if(key=="Keep-Alive" || key=="Keep-alive")
00566                 this->setKeep_alive(value);
00567         else if(key=="Connection")
00568                 this->setConnection(value);
00569         else if(key=="Cache-Control" || key=="Cache-control")
00570                 this->setCache_ctrl(value);
00571         else if(key=="Content-Type" || key=="Content-type")
00572         {
00573                 this->setContent_type(value);
00574                 string tempi(value);
00575                 size_t s = tempi.find("boundary");
00576                 if(s!=string::npos)
00577                 {
00578                         this->setContent_type(tempi.substr(0,s));
00579                         tempi = tempi.substr(s);
00580                         strVec results;
00581                         boost::iter_split(results, tempi, boost::first_finder("="));
00582                         if(results.size()==2)
00583                         {
00584                                 string bound = "--" + results.at(1).substr(0,results.at(1).length());
00585                                 this->setContent_boundary(bound);
00586                         }
00587                 }
00588         }
00589         else if(key=="Content" && value!="")
00590         {
00591                 if((this->getContent_type().find("application/soap+xml")!=string::npos || this->getContent_type().find("text/xml")!=string::npos))
00592                 {
00593                         value = value.substr(0,value.find_last_of(">")+1);
00594                         if(value.find("<?")!=string::npos && value.find("?>")!=string::npos)
00595                         {
00596                                 value = value.substr(value.find("?>")+2);
00597                         }
00598                         this->setContent(value);
00599                 }
00600                 else if(this->getContent_type().find("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")!=string::npos)
00601                 {
00602                         strVec params;
00603                         boost::iter_split(params,value , boost::first_finder("&"));
00604                         for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00605                         {
00606                                 strVec param;
00607                                 boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00608                                 if(param.size()==2)
00609                                 {
00610                                         string att = param.at(0);
00611                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00612                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00613                                         boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00614                                         this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00615                                 }
00616                         }
00617                 }
00618                 else
00619                 {
00620                         size_t rn = value.find_first_of("\r\n");
00621                         string h = boost::lexical_cast<string>(rn);
00622 
00623                         string boundary = this->getContent_boundary();
00624                         fprintf(stderr,boundary.c_str());
00625                         fprintf(stderr,value.c_str());
00626                         fflush(stderr);
00627 
00628                         string retval;
00629                         string delb = boundary+"\r\n";
00630                         string delend = boundary+"--\r\n";
00631                         size_t stb = value.find_first_of(delb)+delb.length();
00632                         size_t enb = value.find_last_not_of(delend);
00633                         h = boost::lexical_cast<string>(stb)+" "+boost::lexical_cast<string>(enb);
00634 
00635                         string param_conts = value.substr(stb,enb-stb-2);
00636                         strVec parameters;
00637                         boost::replace_first(value,delb,"");
00638                         boost::replace_first(value,delend,"");
00639                         delb = "\r\n"+delb;
00640                         boost::iter_split(parameters, value, boost::first_finder(delb));
00641                         retval =  "Boundary: "+ boundary + "\nLength: " ;
00642                         retval += boost::lexical_cast<string>(value.length()) +"\nStart End: "
00643                         + boost::lexical_cast<string>(stb) + " " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(enb) +"\n";
00644 
00645                         for(unsigned j=0;j<parameters.size();j++)
00646                         {
00647                                 if(parameters.at(j)=="" || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of(" ")==string::npos
00648                                                 || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of("\r\n")==string::npos)
00649                                         continue;
00650                                 fprintf(stderr,parameters.at(j).c_str());
00651                                 fflush(stderr);
00652                                 FormData datf;
00653                                 string parm = parameters.at(j);
00654                                 retval+= parm + "\nparm";
00655                                 size_t dis = parm.find("Content-Disposition: ");
00656                                 if(dis==string::npos)
00657                                         dis = parm.find("Content-disposition: ");
00658                                 string cont_disp,cont_type;
00659                                 if(dis!=string::npos)
00660                                 {
00661                                         size_t dist = parm.find("Content-Type: ");
00662                                         if(dist==string::npos)
00663                                                 dist = parm.find("Content-type: ");
00664                                         size_t dise;
00665                                         if(dist==string::npos)
00666                                         {
00667                                                 dist = parm.find("\r\n\r\n");
00668                                                 dise = dist + 4;
00669                                         }
00670                                         else
00671                                         {
00672                                                 cont_type = parm.substr(dist+14,parm.find("\r\n\r\n")-(dist+14));
00673                                                 dise = parm.find("\r\n\r\n") + 4;
00674                                         }
00675                                         cont_disp = parm.substr(dis+21,dist-(dis+21));
00676                                         boost::replace_first(cont_disp,"\r\n","");
00677                                         retval+=  "\ncdisp = " + cont_disp;
00678                                         retval+= "\ndise = " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(dise);
00679                                         parm = parm.substr(dise);
00680                                         parm = parm.substr(0,parm.length()-1);
00681                                 }
00682                                 strVec parmdef;
00683                                 boost::iter_split(parmdef, cont_disp, boost::first_finder(";"));
00684                                 string key;
00685                                 for(unsigned k=0;k<parmdef.size();k++)
00686                                 {
00687                                         if(parmdef.at(k)!="" && parmdef.at(k).find("=")!=string::npos)
00688                                         {
00689                                                 size_t stpd = parmdef.at(k).find_first_not_of(" ");
00690                                                 size_t enpd = parmdef.at(k).find_last_not_of(" ");
00691                                                 retval+=  "\nparmdef = " + parmdef.at(k) ;
00692                                                 retval+=  "\nst en = " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(stpd)  + " " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(enpd);
00693                                                 string propert = parmdef.at(k).substr(stpd,enpd-stpd+1);
00694                                                 strVec proplr;
00695                                                 boost::iter_split(proplr, propert, boost::first_finder("="));
00696                                                 if(proplr.size()==2)
00697                                                 {
00698                                                         if(proplr.at(0)=="name" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00699                                                         {
00700                                                                 key = proplr.at(1);
00701                                                                 key = key.substr(key.find_first_not_of("\""),key.find_last_not_of("\"")-key.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00702                                                                 datf.type = cont_type;
00703                                                                 datf.value = parm;
00704                                                         }
00705                                                         else if(proplr.at(0)=="filename" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00706                                                         {
00707                                                                 string fna = proplr.at(1);
00708                                                                 fna = fna.substr(fna.find_first_not_of("\""),fna.find_last_not_of("\"")-fna.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00709                                                                 datf.fileName = fna;
00710                                                         }
00711                                                 }
00712                                         }
00713                                 }
00714                                 if(key!="")
00715                                 {
00716                                         this->setRequestParamF(key,datf);
00717                                         retval+= (key + " " + datf.type + " "+ datf.fileName+" "+ datf.value);
00718                                 }
00719                         }
00720                 }
00721 
00722         }
00723         else if(key=="Content-Length" || key=="Content-length")
00724                 this->setContent_len(value);
00725         else if(key=="Referer")
00726                 this->setReferer(value);
00727         else if(key=="Pragma")
00728                 this->setPragma(value);
00729         else if(key=="Method")
00730                 this->setMethod(value);
00731         else if(key=="HttpVersion")
00732                 this->setHttpVersion(value);
00733         else if(key=="GetArguments")
00734         {
00735                 strVec params;
00736                 boost::iter_split(params, value, boost::first_finder("&"));
00737                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00738                 {
00739                         strVec param;
00740                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00741                         if(param.size()==2)
00742                         {
00743                                 string att = param.at(0);
00744                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00745                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00746                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00747                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00748                         }
00749                 }
00750         }
00751         /*else if(key=="PostArguments")
00752         {
00753                 strVec params;
00754                 boost::iter_split(params, value, boost::first_finder("&"));
00755                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00756                 {
00757                         strVec param;
00758                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00759                         if(param.size()==2)
00760                         {
00761                                 string att = param.at(0);
00762                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00763                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00764                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00765                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00766                         }
00767                 }
00768         }*/
00769         else if(boost::find_first(key, "URL"))
00770         {
00771                 boost::replace_first(key,"URL","");
00772                 strVec memp;
00773                 this->setActUrl(value);
00774                 boost::iter_split(memp, value, boost::first_finder("/"));
00775                 int fs = value.find_first_of("/");
00776                 int es = value.find_last_of("/");
00777                 if(fs==es)
00778                 {
00779                         this->setCntxt_root(key+"default");
00780                         this->setCntxt_name("default");
00781                         this->setFile(value.substr(es+1));
00782                         this->setUrl(key+"default/"+value);
00783                 }
00784                 else
00785                 {
00786                         int ss = value.substr(fs+1).find("/");
00787                         if(ss>fs)
00788                         {
00789                                 this->setCntxt_name(value.substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00790                                 this->setCntxt_root(key+this->getCntxt_name());
00791                                 this->setFile(value.substr(es+1));
00792                                 this->setUrl(key+value);
00793                         }
00794                 }
00795         }
00796         return retval;
00797 }
00798 
00799 string HttpRequest::toString()
00800 {
00801         string ret;
00802         ret = "\nHost: "+this->getHost();
00803         ret += "\nAccept: "+this->getAccept();
00804         ret += "\nAccept Chars: "+this->getAccept_chars();
00805         ret += "\nAccept Encoding: "+this->getAccept_encod();
00806         ret += "\nAccept Language: "+this->getAccept_lang();
00807         ret += "\nCache Ctrl: "+this->getCache_ctrl();
00808         ret += "\nConnection: "+this->getConnection();
00809         ret += "\nContent: "+this->getContent();
00810         ret += "\nContent Length: "+this->getContent_len();
00811         ret += "\nContent Type: "+this->getContent_type();
00812         ret += "\nHttp Version: "+this->getHttpVersion();
00813         ret += "\nMethod: "+this->getMethod();
00814         ret += "\nUser agent: "+this->getUser_agent();
00815         ret += "\nUrl: "+this->getUrl();
00816         ret += "\nFile: "+this->getFile();
00817         ret += "\nContext Name: "+this->getCntxt_name();
00818         ret += "\nContext Root: "+this->getCntxt_root();
00819         ret += "\nDefault Locale: "+this->getDefaultLocale();
00820         ret += "\nContent Boundary: "+this->getContent_boundary();
00821         string vals;
00822         if(this->requestParams.size()>0)
00823         {
00824                 RMap::iterator iter;
00825                 for (iter=this->requestParams.begin();iter!=this->requestParams.end();iter++)
00826                 {
00827                         vals+= ("\nKey: "+iter->first + " Value: "+iter->second);
00828                 }
00829         }
00830         if(this->requestParamsF.size()>0)
00831         {
00832                 FMap::iterator iter;
00833                 for (iter=this->requestParamsF.begin();iter!=this->requestParamsF.end();iter++)
00834                 {
00835                         FormData dat = iter->second;
00836                         vals+= ("\nKey: "+iter->first + " Type: "+dat.type + " FileName: "+dat.fileName);
00837                         vals+= ("\nValue: "+dat.value);
00838                 }
00839         }
00840         ret += "\nRequest Parameters "+vals;//boost::lexical_cast<string>(this->getRequestParams().size());
00841         return ret;
00842 }

01066 string HttpRequest::getRequestParam(string key)
01067 {
01068         if(this->requestParams.find(key)!=this->requestParams.end())
01069                 return this->requestParams[key];
01070         else if(this->requestParamsF.find(key)!=this->requestParamsF.end())
01071                 return this->requestParamsF[key].value;
01072         else
01073                 return "";
01074 }
01075 
01076 string HttpRequest::getRequestParamType(string key)
01077 {
01078         if(this->requestParamsF.find(key)!=this->requestParamsF.end())
01079                 return this->requestParamsF[key].type;
01080         else
01081                 return "";
01082 }
